long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With Renoon you can discover which sustainability value a specific brand is respecting. 
We verify their claims and show you when browsing on their website what you can trust. 

When you browse on a website click on our extension and you will be able to identify the areas of impact that a brand is focusing on. 

If the brand has not been verified you will find the possibility to request the verification by submitting a form. 

If you have any feedback or questions, let us know at info@renoon.com
